oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Life Can Be Beautiful - 1942-05-11
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Episode of radio drama Life Can Be Beautiful, sponsored by Proctor & Gamble. Written by Carl Bixby and Don Becker. Ruth Weston as Maude Kellogg, John Holbrook or Earl Larrimore as Stephen Hamilton. Year of broadcast is unconfirmed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer opening statement -- Ivory Soap commercial -- Life Can Be Beautiful episode -- Ivory Soap commercial -- Closing statement Charles [Siefert?]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; Life can be beautiful (Radio program); Bixby, Carl, 1895-1978); Becker, Don, -1991; KWTO (Radio station : Springfield, Mo.); KGBX (Radio station : Springfield, Mo.)
